name: Treasure Hunt (RectorStudio)
description:
Treasure Hunt is a simple minigame, which was conceived as learning material for RectorClass' "Ren'Py Intermediate" course.

The lesson revolves around using Ren'Py screens for interactive data visualization and manipulation.

The objective of the game is to find the treasure chest with a diamond inside it. There are 20 chests, and the winning one is randomized just before the 20 chests are displayed.

The game can be played more than one time: it counts the number of retrieved diamonds, and randomizes the winning chest each time a new "hand" is displayed.

RectorClass Ren'Py Intermediate course is currently under development: this page will be updates as soon as classes will be set and material released.
